verses.verse: <S%G27>Beloved,<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> work in <S%G3739>whatever<s%> you <S%G2038>accomplish<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> those who are <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3581>strangers.<s%>

<S%G3739>They<s%> have <S%G3140>testified<s%> about <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> the <S%G1577>assembly.<s%> You will <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> to send <S%G3739>them<s%> forward on their <S%G4311>journey<s%> in a way <S%G516>worthy<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>
<S%G2249>We<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> to <S%G618>receive<s%> <S%G5108>such,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we may <S%G1096>be<s%> fellow <S%G4904>workers<s%> for the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

I wrote <S%G1125>to<s%> the <S%G1577>assembly,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1361>Diotrephes,<s%> who loves to be <S%G5383>first<s%> among <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G1926>accept<s%> what we <S%G2248>say.<s%>

<S%G5124>Therefore,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2064>come,<s%> I will call <S%G5279>attention<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G4160>does,<s%> unjustly <S%G5396>accusing<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G3056>with<s%> <S%G4190>wicked<s%> <S%G3056>words.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3361>Not<s%> <S%G714>content<s%> <S%G5125>with<s%> <S%G3777>this,<s%> neither <S%G1926>does<s%> he <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G1926>receive<s%> the <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those who <S%G1014>would,<s%> he <S%G2967>forbids<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1544>throws<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1577>assembly.<s%>

<S%G27>Beloved,<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G3401>imitate<s%> that which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G2556>evil,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> that which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G18>good.<s%> <S%G3588>He<s%> who does <S%G15>good<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>He<s%> who does <S%G2554%G99999>evil<s%> <S%G3756>hasn't<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

I <S%G2192>had<s%> many <S%G4183>things<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> to <S%G235>you,<s%> but I <S%G2309>am<s%> <S%G3756>unwilling<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> to <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G3188>ink<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2563>pen;<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> I <S%G1679>hope<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G4571>you<s%> <S%G2112>soon,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> we <S%G1492>will<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G4750>face<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G4750>face.<s%> <S%G1515>Peace<s%> be to <S%G4671>you.<s%> The <S%G5384>friends<s%> <S%G782>greet<s%> <S%G4571>you.<s%> <S%G782>Greet<s%> the <S%G5384>friends<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G3686>name.<s%>
